channel.title: Comments on: Simple Grain-Free Pumpkin Bread (AIP & Vegan)

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/simple-grain-free-pumpkin-bread-aip-vegan/#comment-525">M Fisher</a>.
I am sorry to hear the recipe didn't turn out as you wanted. Perhaps it was too crumbly due to difference in oven temperature (every oven is a bit different) or another variable. If you want to try it again, you can try adding in a little more pumpkin puree since it acts as a binder or you can add a gelatin egg. Hopefully the flavor was at least enjoyable for you.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to M Fisher.

I am sorry to hear the recipe didn’t turn out as you wanted. Perhaps it was too crumbly due to difference in oven temperature (every oven is a bit different) or another variable. If you want to try it again, you can try adding in a little more pumpkin puree since it acts as a binder or you can add a gelatin egg. Hopefully the flavor was at least enjoyable for you.

item.title: By: M Fisher
item.dc:creator: M Fisher
item.description: Weighed all ingredients out and followed exactly. There is no binder in this recipe. Even after resting from the oven it crumbles and doesn't keep its shape. Some really expensive ingredients in this recipe.
item.content:encoded: Weighed all ingredients out and followed exactly. There is no binder in this recipe. Even after resting from the oven it crumbles and doesn’t keep its shape. Some really expensive ingredients in this recipe.

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/simple-grain-free-pumpkin-bread-aip-vegan/#comment-518">Fanny Winkelman</a>.
Hi Fanny, thanks for reaching out! I think sweet potato puree should work just fine. It will have a different flavor but I imagine it will still taste great. Let me know how it turns out for you!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Fanny Winkelman.

Hi Fanny, thanks for reaching out! I think sweet potato puree should work just fine. It will have a different flavor but I imagine it will still taste great. Let me know how it turns out for you!

item.title: By: Fanny Winkelman
item.dc:creator: Fanny Winkelman
item.description: I will try this today. I do not have pumpkin at hand though, but sweet potato. Since the texture is somewhat the same, and they are both sweet, I hope they are interchangeable
item.content:encoded: I will try this today. I do not have pumpkin at hand though, but sweet potato. Since the texture is somewhat the same, and they are both sweet, I hope they are interchangeable

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/simple-grain-free-pumpkin-bread-aip-vegan/#comment-461">Ellen</a>.
Hi Ellen, thank you so much for your review. It makes me so happy to hear it is one of the best pumpkin breads you have every had - what a nice compliment!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ellen.

Hi Ellen, thank you so much for your review. It makes me so happy to hear it is one of the best pumpkin breads you have every had – what a nice compliment!

item.title: By: Ellen
item.dc:creator: Ellen
item.description: One of the best pumpkin bread I have ever had (regular or AIP)! It has a good texture and flavor.
item.content:encoded: One of the best pumpkin bread I have ever had (regular or AIP)! It has a good texture and flavor.
